about_the_game:
Blast foes with a new semi-auto carbine, charms and skins!

Lightweight and easy to use, the M1 Semi-auto Carbine lets you shred the dead and stave off dread! This American-made extinction event is perfect for close-range combat, taking down enemies in seconds!
This weapon bundle contains;
- The M1 Carbine
- 2 charms (Uncle Sam Hat + Baseball Bat)
- 2 bespoke weapon skins (Painted US Flag + Baseball Leather).
